text:
From Hopeful Australia Beginnings to a Tragic Hollywood End: 10 Heartbreaking Moments From I Am Heath Ledger

Nearly a decade after his untimely death, Heath Ledger’s life is back in the limelight thanks to a newly released film. I Am Heath Ledger, a documentary directed by Derik Murray and…
